verses.verse: Then Jacob <WH3290> summoned <WH7121> his sons <WH1121> and said, <WH559> "Assemble <WH622> yourselves that I may tell <WH5046> you what <WH834> shall befall <WH7122> you in the days <WH3117> to come. <WH319>
"Gather <WH6908> together and hear, <WH8085> O sons <WH1121> of Jacob; <WH3290> And listen <WH8085> to Israel <WH3478> your father.
"Reuben, <WH7205> you are my first-born; My might <WH3581> and the beginning <WH7225> of my strength, <WH202> Preeminent <WH3499> in dignity <WH7613> and preeminent <WH3499> in power. <WH5794>

"Uncontrolled <WH6349> as water, <WH4325> you shall not have <WH3498> preeminence, <WH3498> Because <WH3588> you went <WH5927> up to your father's bed; <WH4904> Then <WH227> you defiled <WH2490> [it] – he went <WH5927> up to my couch. <WH3326>
"Simeon <WH8095> and Levi <WH3878> are brothers; <WH251> Their swords <WH4380> are implements <WH3627> of violence. <WH2555>

"Let my soul <WH5315> not enter <WH935> into their council; <WH5475> Let not my glory <WH9202> be united <WH3161> with their assembly; <WH6951> Because <WH3588> in their anger <WH639> they slew <WH2026> men, <WH376> And in their self-will they lamed <WH9432> oxen. <WH7794>

"Cursed <WH779> be their anger, <WH639> for it is fierce; <WH5794> And their wrath, <WH5678> for it is cruel. <WH7185> I will disperse <WH2505> them in Jacob, <WH3290> And scatter <WH6327> them in Israel. <WH3478>

"Judah, <WH3063> your brothers <WH251> shall praise <WH3034> you; Your hand <WH3027> shall be on the neck <WH6203> of your enemies; <WH340> Your father's sons <WH1121> shall bow <WH7812> down <WH7812> to you.

"Judah <WH3063> is a lion <WH9030>'s whelp; <WH1482> From the prey, <WH2964> my son, <WH1121> you have gone <WH5927> up. He couches, <WH3766> he lies <WH7257> down <WH7257> as a lion, <WH3833> And as a lion, who <WH4310> dares rouse <WH6965> him up?

"The scepter <WH7626> shall not depart <WH5493> from Judah, <WH3063> Nor <WH3808> the ruler's staff <WH2710> from between <WH996> his feet, <WH7272> Until <WH5704> <WH3588> Shiloh <WH7886> comes, <WH935> And to him [shall be] the obedience <WH3349> of the peoples. <WH5971>

"He ties <WH631> [his] foal <WH5895> to the vine, <WH1612> And his donkey's colt <WH1121> to the choice <WH9634> vine; <WH9634> He washes <WH3526> his garments <WH3830> in wine, <WH3196> And his robes <WH5497> in the blood <WH1818> of grapes. <WH6025>
"His eyes <WH5869> are dull <WH2447> from wine, <WH3196> And his teeth <WH8127> white <WH3836> from milk. <WH2461>
"Zebulun <WH2074> shall dwell <WH7931> at the seashore <WH3220>; <WH2348> And he [shall be] a haven <WH2348> for ships, <WH591> And his flank <WH3411> [shall be] toward <WH5921> Sidon. <WH6721>
"Issachar <WH3485> is a strong <WH1634> donkey, <WH2543> Lying <WH7257> down <WH7257> between <WH996> the sheepfolds. <WH4942>

"When he saw <WH7200> that a resting <WH4496> place <WH4496> was good <WH2896> And that the land <WH776> was pleasant, <WH5276> He bowed <WH5186> his shoulder <WH7926> to bear <WH5445> [burdens], And became <WH1961> a slave <WH5647> at forced <WH4522> labor. <WH4522>
"Dan <WH1835> shall judge <WH1777> his people, <WH5971> As one <WH259> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel. <WH3478>

"Dan <WH1835> shall be a serpent <WH5175> in the way, <WH1870> A horned <WH8207> snake <WH8207> in the path, <WH734> That bites <WH5391> the horse's heels, <WH6119> So that his rider <WH7392> falls <WH5307> backward. <WH268>
"For Thy salvation <WH3444> I wait, <WH6960> O Lord. <WH3068>
"As for Gad, <WH1410> raiders <WH1416> shall raid <WH1464> him, But he shall raid <WH1464> [at] their heels. <WH6119>
"As for Asher, <WH836> his food <WH3899> shall be rich, <WH8082> And he shall yield <WH5414> royal <WH4428> dainties. <WH4574>
"Naphtali <WH5321> is a doe <WH355> let <WH7971> loose, <WH7971> He gives <WH5414> beautiful <WH8233> words. <WH561>
"Joseph <WH3130> is a fruitful <WH6509> bough, <WH1121> A fruitful <WH6509> bough <WH1121> by a spring; <WH5869> [Its] branches <WH1323> run <WH6805> over <WH5921> a wall. <WH7791>
"The archers <WH1167> <WH2671> bitterly <WH4843> attacked him, And shot <WH7232> [at him] and harassed <WH7852> him;

But his bow <WH7198> remained <WH3427> firm, <WH386> And his arms <WH2220> were agile, <WH6339> From the hands <WH3027> of the Mighty <WH46> One <WH46> of Jacob <WH3290> (From there <WH8033> is the Shepherd, <WH7462> the Stone <WH68> of Israel <WH3478>),

From the God <WH410> of your father who helps <WH1> you, And by the Almighty <WH5826> who blesses <WH7706> you [With] blessings <WH1288> of heaven <WH1293> above, <WH8064> <WH4480> Blessings <WH5921> of the deep <WH1293> that lies <WH8415> beneath, <WH7257> Blessings <WH8478> of the breasts <WH1293> and of the womb. <WH7699>

"The blessings <WH1293> of your father Have surpassed <WH1> the blessings <WH1396> of my ancestors <WH1293> Up to the utmost <WH2029> bound <WH8379> of the everlasting <WH8379> hills; <WH5769> May they be on the head <WH1389> of Joseph, <WH7218> And on the crown <WH3130> of the head <WH6936> of the one <WH6936> distinguished <WH5139> among his brothers. <WH5139>
"Benjamin <WH1144> is a ravenous <WH2963> wolf; <WH2061> In the morning <WH1242> he devours <WH398> the prey, <WH5706> And in the evening <WH6153> he divides <WH2505> the spoil. <WH7998>"

All <WH3605> these <WH428> are the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> and this <WH2088> is what <WH834> their father said <WH1> to them when he blessed <WH1696> them. He blessed <WH1288> them, every <WH1288> one <WH376> with the blessing <WH376> appropriate to him.

Then he charged <WH6680> them and said <WH559> to them, "I am about to be gathered <WH622> to my people; <WH9415> bury <WH6912> me with my fathers in the cave <WH1> that is in the field <WH4631> of Ephron <WH7704> the Hittite, <WH6085>

in the cave <WH4631> that is in the field <WH7704> of Machpelah, <WH4375> which <WH834> is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Mamre, <WH4471> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which <WH834> Abraham <WH85> bought <WH7069> along with the field <WH7704> from Ephron <WH6085> the Hittite <WH2850> for a burial <WH6913> site. <WH272>

"There <WH8033> they buried <WH6912> Abraham <WH85> and his wife <WH802> Sarah, <WH8283> there <WH8033> they buried <WH6912> Isaac <WH3327> and his wife <WH802> Rebekah, <WH7259> and there <WH8033> I buried <WH6912> Leah <WH3812> –
the field <WH7704> and the cave <WH4631> that is in it, purchased <WH4735> from the sons <WH1121> of Heth. <WH2845> "

When Jacob <WH3290> finished <WH3615> charging <WH6680> his sons, <WH1121> he drew <WH622> his feet <WH7272> into the bed <WH4296> and breathed <WH1478> his last, <WH1478> and was gathered <WH622> to his people. <WH9415>
